altTitles.vi: Nàng Juliet ở trường nội trú

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

description.en: Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!
description.vi: Inuzuka Romio và Juliet Persia đang hẹn hò, song vì xuất thân từ hai đất nước đối địch nên họ không thể công khai mối quan hệ dù học chung một trường. Nhưng tình hình đã có sự thay đổi nhờ Hasuki - người bạn thơ ấu đem lòng thương Inuzuka!

altTitles.ja: ライアーゲーム

altTitles.vi: Trò chơi dối trá

description.en:
The card reads as follows:  
Congratulations! You are one of the 1 in 100,000 people who has been entered in the amazing LIAR GAME TOURNAMENT!  
  
Along with the postcard there is 100 million yen in notes. That's the beginning of the Liar Game. When the game ends, in 30 days, you will have to return your 100 million. If your opponent steals them, he can keep them as a prize, and you will have a debt of 100 million…
description.vi: Câu chuyện về Liar Game bắt đầu khi 1 tấm thiệp được gửi đến cho Kanzaki Nao, một cô gái thuộc dạng... ngây thơ cụ. Kèm với tấm thiệp bí ẩn này là 100 triệu yên. Cô gái đáng thương bị ép buộc phải tham gia 1 trò chơi khủng khiếp có tên là LIAR GAME, trong đó luật chơi rất đơn giản: hãy cướp cho được tiền của đối thủ, và nếu ai bị mất tiền, thì sẽ buộc phải mang một khoản nợ bằng đúng số tiền đó... Điều đó cũng có nghĩa là: Nếu bị mất 100 triệu yên, thì bạn sẽ phải mang nợ 100 triệu. Trong hoàn cảnh này, cô gái ngây thơ thật thà phải làm sao, cam chịu mang nợ, hay là tìm người giúp đỡ, cho dù đấy có là ai đi chăng nữa...
description.pt-br: Nao Kanzaki, uma estudante extremamente honesta, um dia recebe um pacote contendo 100 milhõs de ienes e uma carta. Ela então descobre que faz parte do seleto grupo de 1 em cada 100.000 pessoas que foram escolhidas para participar de um jogo que pode resultar em extrema riqueza ou na desgraça total. O que define quem ganha e quem perde? Sua capacidade de enganar e manipular outras pessoas. E então qual será o desfecho deste jogo que explora os limites da psicologia humana?

altTitles.ja: いちご100%

description.en:
Scene: The School Rooftop  
The hero (me, Junpei Manaka!) sneaks up to the roof to see the sunset. When he opens the door, he startles a mysterious beauty. She panics and runs away, but not before Junpei has caught sight of her adorable strawberry print panties…in EXTREME close-up. With that vision forever burned into his memory, Junpei embarks on a quest to find the girl, and the panties, of his dreams!  
  


---
description.ja: 放課後、校舎の屋上で出会ったいちごパンツの美少女。フツーの中学3年生・真中淳平は夕日に映えるその姿にすっかり心を奪われてしまった!!　彼女は誰？
description.pt-br: Junpei Manaka é um estudante da oitava série e, como todo adolescente, possui um sonho: o de ser um grande diretor de filmes. Porém, ele nunca encontrou sua verdadeira inspiração para dar o primeiro passo e trabalhar em suas ambições. Após o termino de suas aulas diárias, Junpei sobe até o telhado da escola para relaxar e observar o pôr do sol quando, curiosamente ao abrir a porta, vê desenhos de vários morangos caindo sobre sua face. Logo depois de se recuperar do susto ele vê uma linda garota muito corada o encarando, e percebendo que aqueles desenhos faziam parte da calcinha da jovem, o rapaz tenta se desculpar, porém, a garota foge deixando apenas uma forte lembrança para ele.No dia seguinte, Junpei passa a investigar todas as garotas que possuem uma calcinha de morangos, tentando achar sua musa de inspiração, o que o leva a se confessar para a garota mais bonita do colégio aos berros e fazendo flexões de barra para chamar ainda mais a atenção da jovem, mas o que ele não esperava era que a garota realmente aceitasse a sua confissão e assim uma relação sem amor começasse entre os dois.Mais tarde, Junpei descobre que a bela jovem da calcinha de morangos é na verdade sua colega de sala, porém, ela se veste habitualmente de modo tão nerd que ele nunca a encontraria, e com este grande choque o rapaz acaba ferindo sua “namorada” forçando o término de sua relação com ela. Agora ele correrá atrás de sua musa de calcinha de morangos, tanto por causa de seu coração quanto por causa de seus sonhos.

altTitles.ja: トリコ

description.en:
In the world where the taste and texture of food are very important, there is Toriko, a hunter of precious foods regularly hired by restaurants and the rich.  
He's a man with the inhuman skills necessary to capture the ferocious, evasive, and rare animals to complete his ultimate dinner course!  
His current accomplice is a weak, timid person who was inspired by Toriko's greatness and accompanies him on all his journeys on his quest for the course of his life.  
  
Note: Was nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde o sabor e a textura dos alimentos são muito importantes vive Toriko, um caçador de alimentos preciosos regularmente contratado por restaurantes e homens ricos, um homem com aptidões desumanas para capturar os animais ferozes, evasivos e raros para concluir seu sonho de uma refeição perfeita e também um jovem gourmet, uma pessoa fraca e tímida, que foi inspirado pela grandeza de Toriko a acompanha-lo em suas viagens em busca de seu sonho!

title.en: Kokumin-teki Idol ni natta Osana-Najimi ga Boro-Apart ni Sunderu Ore no Tonari ni Hikkoshitekita Ken

altTitles.ja: 国民的アイドルになった幼馴染みが、ボロアパートに住んでる俺の隣に引っ越してきた件

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend, Who Became a National Idol, Moved into My Dingy Flat Next Door.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Amiga de la Infancia que se Volvió una Idol Famosa, se Mudó al Lado de mi Departamento

altTitles.es: La Idol de Fama Nacional, que Resultó ser mi Amiga de la Infancia, es Ahora mi Vecina

altTitles.vi: Hàng xóm tôi là Idol quốc dân

description.en: My childhood friend who became separated three years ago is dancing on TV as a top idol. And it was the childhood friend who moved to the next to my room to see it!?
description.es: Mi amiga de la infancia, que se había separado hace tres años, está bailando en la tele como una de las mejores idols. ¿Y fue mi amiga de la infancia la que se mudó al lado de mi habitación para verme?
description.ja: 第1巻の内容紹介: 音大に通っている俺が住んでいるボロアパート、その隣の部屋に突然引っ越してきたのは国民的アイドルにして幼馴染みの東城美月！ 3年前の約束を支えにトップまで上り詰めた彼女との奇妙なご近所生活が始まる！

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Chiến Luân Hồi

altTitles.ru: Всё, что тебе нужно - это убивать

altTitles.ja: オールユーニードイズキル

altTitles.uk: Все, що тобі потрібно - це вбивати.

description.ar:
منذ أن غزت الكائنات الفضائية جيتاي الأرض، بدأت البشرية تتراجع والآن بعدما أصبحت اليابان تقريبًا محاطة بالجيتاي. كيجي كيريا هو مجرد واحد من العديد من المجندين الجدد الذين تم إجبارهم على ارتداء زي درع المعركة وإرسالهم لقتل الكائنات الفضائية. في مهمة مشتركة مع القوات الخاصة الأمريكية بقيادة ريتا، المعروفة باسم "عاهرة الحرب"، مات كيجي في ساحة المعركة، لكن ليجد نفسه يعود للحياة من جديد.
بعد أربع مرات من الـ "موت" ، أدرك كيجي أنه يجب عليه الفوز في المعركة للخروج من الحلقة...
description.en:
Since the alien Gitai invaded the Earth, humankind has been retreating. Now that Japan is almost surrounded by the Gitai, Keiji Kiriya is just one of many new recruits forced into a suit of battle armor and sent out to kill aliens. On a joint mission with the US special force led by Rita, known as the Bitch of the War, Keiji dies on the battlefield, only to find himself reborn.   
After 4 times of "death," Kiriya realizes that he has to win the battle to get out of the loop…  
  
**Notes:**   
- [The 2014 movie 'Edge of Tomorrow' starring Tom Cruise](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vw61gCe2oqI) is an adaptation of the original novel (with a different ending).  
  
 [Official Vietnamese](https://www.fahasa.com/all-you-need-is-kill-cuoc-chien-luan-hoi-manga-bo-2-tap.html?attempt=1)
description.uk:
Відтоді, як прибульці Міміки вторглися на Землю, людство відступає. Тепер, коли Японія майже оточена Міміками, Кейджі Кірія - лише один з багатьох новобранців, яких вдягнули в бойові обладунки і відправили вбивати прибульців. Під час спільної місії зі спецпідрозділом США на чолі з Рітою, відомою як “Амазонка війни”, Кейджі гине на полі бою, але потім відроджується.
Після 4-х "смертей" Кірія усвідомлює, що мусить виграти битву, аби вирватися з петлі...
description.pt-br: Quando a Terra é tomada por alienígenas, um jovem soldado fica preso no tempo, condenado a voltar sempre ao dia anterior a uma guerra. Entretanto, com as repetições, suas habilidades de guerreiro melhoram, e ele tem uma possibilidade de mudar o curso do dia. Um mangá adaptado de um livro que receberá uma adaptação protagonizada pelo Tom Cruise que estreará em 2014.

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

altTitles.ja: 怨み屋本舗

description.en:
The world is filled with cruel scum, ranging from petty thieves to sociopath maniacs. When a vile low-life inflicts pain and suffering on innocent victims, sometimes their anger becomes overwhelming. Whether their damage stems from romance, finance, reputation or even a death, these victims feel trapped in their own skins and lives. 

Those victims who can't stand it anymore call for the mysterious woman Houjou Shiori, owner of Uramiya, the "Revenge Shop". 

The Uramiya specializes in executing revenge schemes. The vengeance their customers request on their bitterly resented enemies could range from financially destroying them, to smearing their social reputation, to even taking their lives. As long as you pay a fair price, the Uramiya will guarantee you get the revenge you deserve.

altTitles.ja: サンタの墓標のその先で

altTitles.ja-ro: Santa no Bohyou no Sono Saki de

description.en: It’s Christmas eve. In a busy shopping mall, Ginya, an orphan boy, meets Okuri, a lost girl. Ginya goes along with Okuri, who believes in Santa, to find her father, but then suddenly an earthquake hits the area…! ?

title.en: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara

altTitles.ja: 一生働きたくない俺が、クラスメイトの大人気アイドルに懐かれたら

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng idol đói bụng và anh chàng yêu nội trợ

altTitles.en: A Very Popular Idol Classmate Has Taken a Liking to Me, A Person Who Doesn’t Want to Work for my Whole Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Isshou Hatarakita Kunai Ore ga, Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Idakaretara

altTitles.zh: 班里的人气偶像黏上了一辈子不想工作的我

altTitles.vi: Siêu Idol Cùng Lớp Lại Thích Một Người Như Tôi?

description.en: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
description.ja: 専業主夫を目指す高校生・志藤凛太郎のクラスには、世間でも大人気のアイドル・乙咲玲が在籍していた。同級生であること以外の関係がない二人だったが、空腹で倒れそうになった玲に凛太郎が手料理を振る舞ったことで関係は一変！ あまりの美味しさに玲は「毎日食べに来ていい？」と言ってきて……!?
description.vi: Shido Rintaro, nam sinh cao trung ước ao trở thành một ông chồng nội trợ, học cùng lớp với idol nổi tiếng Otosaki Rei. Cả hai không liên quan gì đến nhau trừ việc học cùng lớp. Đó là cho đến khi Rei xém ngất xỉu vì đói, và được Rintaro nấu ăn cho. Tay nghề cậu ta khá đến nỗi Rei quyết định sẽ đến ăn chực mỗi ngày...!?
description.pt-br: Rintaro Shido, um estudante do ensino médio que aspira se tornar um dono de casa em tempo integral, está na classe de uma idol muito popular, Rei Otosaki. Os dois não têm nenhuma conexão além de serem colegas de classe, mas seu relacionamento muda drasticamente quando Rintaro serve uma refeição caseira para Rei depois que ela quase desmaia de fome! A comida estava tão deliciosa que Rei disse: "Posso vir aqui todos os dias para comer?"...?!

title.en: Gaman Shinaide, Hades-sama. ~Reikoku na Meiou no Jun'ai wa Michishirenai hodo Fukakude, Omoi~

altTitles.ja: 我慢しないで、ハデス様。
我慢しないで、ハデス様。 ～冷酷な冥王の純愛は底知れないほど深くて、重い～

description.en:
"I … ..can't live without you."

A handsome man slides his moist fingers over the smooth skin of a young girl. His eyes are warm and his delicacy is such that you will believe he’s in love. The world divided between the "World of the Gods", the "Other World", and the "Earthly World", was filled with chaos. In the realm of the gods, the gods enjoyed eternal life. The goddess Persephone works hard every day to care for the plants so that her life will sprout on the earth, but the shoots she raised withered. She will be taken over by Hades, the master of the underworld, who has come to welcome "death".

Persephone laments her grief, but she is moved by Hades' encouragement, and is drawn to his quiet, calm and gentle side... Meanwhile, Persephone decides to offer her own body to save Hades, who has been caught up in the conspiracy of the divine world.

title.en: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni naru zo: Akuyaku Reijou ni naru hodo Ouji no Dekiai wa Kasoku suru you desu!

altTitles.ja: 歴史に残る悪女になるぞ　悪役令嬢になるほど王子の溺愛は加速するようです！

altTitles.en: I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More Villainous I Become, the More the Prince Dotes on Me

altTitles.ko: 역사에 남을 악녀가 될 거야~악역 영애가 될수록 왕자의 사랑은 가속되는 것 같습니다~

altTitles.zh: 成为名垂青史的恶役千金吧！
成为名垂青史的恶役千金吧！少女越坏王子越爱！

altTitles.id: Aku Akan Menjadi Seorang Villainess Yang Akan Dikenang Dalam Sejarah

altTitles.ja-ro: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni naru zo

description.en:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
description.id:
"Aku tidak butuh dunia yang dipenuhi oleh keindahan! Yang kuinginkan hanyalah menjadi seorang villainess yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!!".
Sebagai seseorang yang sangat membeci tipikal heroine yang "baik hati", Aku telah bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang villainess didalam game otome favoritku!, karena keinginanku telah terkabulkan, maka aku akan berusaha untuk menjadi seorang villainess nomer satu yang akan dikenang dalam sejarah!.
Agar hal itu bisa terjadi, maka aku haruslah kuat dan juga cerdas!
Tapi walau aku sudah berusaha keras untuk menjadi vilainess yang kuinginkan... Entah kenapa sang pangeran malah semakin tertarik kepadaku?! Kira-kira bisa tidak ya aku menjadi seorang villainess yang dikenang dalam sejarah....

title.en: Kinnikuman II Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinnikuman Nisei Kyukyoku no Chojin Tag Arc

altTitles.en: Ultimate Muscle 2: Ultimate Chojin Tag arc

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン2世: 究極の超人タッグ編

description.en: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.

altTitles.ja: うしろの正面カムイさん

altTitles.en: Kamui, the One Standing Behind You

altTitles.th: คุณคามุยลุยหลังผี

altTitles.vi: Mặt trái của chú Kamui

description.en: Shizuka is a normal high school girl with the ability to see ghosts. Due to her peculiar tendency to attract ghosts, she works as an assistant to Kamui, a famous psychic. Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!
description.id: Shizuka adalah anak SMA biasa yang bisa melihat makhluk halus. Dia bekerja sebagai asisten dukun terkenal bernama Kamui-san. Teknik mengusir hantu Kamui-san itu agak… unik.
description.ja:
「幽霊が見えるだけ」の普通の女子高生・シヅカ。シヅカは幽霊を引き寄せる特異体質を活かし、有名な霊能力者・カムイの助手として働いている。圧倒的な霊力を誇るカムイだが、その除霊は前代未聞なヤリ方でーーー!?

“超”除霊の幕が開く!! エッッッッッッッッッッロイムエッサイム!!
description.ru: Шизука обычная школьница, которая может видеть призраков. Она работает помощницей известного экзорциста по имени Камуи-сан, правда техника экзорцизма Камуи-сана ........ необычная.
description.zh: 只是能看见幽灵而已”的普通JK耳塚志津香，在超有名超变态的除灵师神威事务所蹭饭吃之余，一同合作除灵的喜剧故事。
description.es-la:
Shizuka es una chica normal de instituto que sólo puede ver fantasmas.
Trabaja como asistente de Kamui, un famoso vidente que tiene una constitución única que atrae a los fantasmas.
Kamui está orgulloso de su abrumador poder psíquico, ¡pero la forma en que elimina los fantasmas es inaudita!
description.pt-br: Shizuka é uma garota comum do ensino médio que consegue enxergar fantasmas, ela trabalha como assistente do famoso médium Kamui-san, aproveitando a característica única dela de poder ver fantasmas. Kamui possui um poder espiritual avassalador, mas seu exorcismo é um pouco diferente do normal.

altTitles.ja: 死にたがりの復讐者

description.en:
A high school girl, Shizuku, who despairs of living after being bullied at school and sexually abused at home, attempts to commit suicide at a deserted shrine, where she is cursed with immortality by an eerie raven. 

Unable to even die, Shizuku decides to use her immortal body to inflict deathly retribution on her tormentors.

 A revenge drama about a high school girl with a different power in her hands!
description.ja:
学校ではいじめ、家庭では性的虐待を受けて生きることに絶望した女子高生・雫は寂れた神社で自殺を図るが、そこで雫は不気味な烏に不死の呪いをかけられる。

死ぬことすらできなくなった雫は、不死のからだを使っていじめた奴らに死の報復を与えると決意する。

異能を手にした女子高生の復讐劇!

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

altTitles.ja: 山田と加瀬さん。

description.en:
Yamada and Kase are now college freshmen living separately in Tokyo, and trying to sustain their loving relationship in an environment that is more open than what they're used to.  
  
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/napal_cace)

altTitles.ja: ゴールデンカムイ

altTitles.th: โกลเดนคามุย

altTitles.vi: Cơn sốt vàng sau chiến tranh

description.de:
Die Jagd nach dem Ainu-Gold hat begonnen…

Wir schreiben das frühe 20. Jahrhundert, kurz nach dem russisch-japanischen Krieg. Hoch im verschneiten Norden Japans schlägt sich ein einzelner Mann durch die Wildnis. Sein Name: Sugimoto, der Unsterbliche. Geplagt von den Erinnerungen an den Krieg versucht er, sein mageres Einkommen durch Goldschürferei aufzubessern – ohne Erfolg.

Aber dann erfährt er von einem riesigen Goldschatz, der einst den Ainu gestohlen wurde. Der einzige Hinweis: eine Schatzkarte, eintätowiert auf die Rücken zahlreicher Gefängnisinsassen, die sich nun auf der Flucht befinden. Gemeinsam mit dem Ainu-Mädchen Asirpa bricht Sugimoto auf die tödlichste Schatzsuche der Geschichte auf. Denn wer dieses Gold jagt, ist bereit, über Leichen zu gehen…

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.en:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
description.es:
Año 37 de la era Meiji. Tras sobrevivir a la guerra Ruso-Japonesa, Sugimoto, apodado “el Inmortal”, se une a la fiebre del oro para ayudar a la viuda de uno de sus amigos caído durante el conflicto. En su búsqueda, alguien le revela que existe un tesoro escondido y que las distintas claves para encontrarlo las llevan tatuadas en sus espaldas peligrosos convictos prófugos. En su camino se topará con Asirpa, quien no solo le salva la vida, sino que además le ayudará a sobrevivir en la dura tundra salvaje. ¡La carrera por hacerse con el tesoro ha comenzado!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.fr:
Saichi Sugimoto est une véritable légende de la guerre russo-japonaise du début du XXe siècle. Surnommé «l'Immortel,» il a survécu aux pires batailles menées dans les régions les plus sauvages qui soient. Mais quand le conflit se termine, il se retrouve seul et sans le sou… C'est alors qu'il apprend l'existence d'un fabuleux trésor de 75 kilos d'or accumulé par les Aïnous, peuple autochtone vivant en harmonie avec la nature. Hélas, le magot a été volé, puis caché par un homme désormais enfermé dans la pire prison d'Hokkaido. Les seuls indices menant au butin sont de mystérieux tatouages inscrits sur la peau de criminels évadés…

Pour Sugimoto, la chasse au trésor est lancée… Cependant, seul, il a peu de chances de s'en sortir. À peine sa quête commence-t-elle qu’il manque de se faire déchiqueter par un ours brun! Il ne doit la vie qu'à l'intervention providentielle d'Ashirpa, jeune indigène liée aux propriétaires légitimes du butin. Ils décident de faire équipe pour affronter les nombreux dangers qui les guettent sur la route de l'or des Aïnous…

Maintes fois primé au Japon, *Golden Kamui* est un formidable mélange d'aventure en milieu hostile et de découverte culturelle, le tout porté par une intrigue aux rebondissements multiples. Laissez-vous entraîner dans cette quête épique à travers les immensités sauvages d'Hokkaido!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.it:
Nel pieno dell’Era Meiji Saichi Sugimoto, ex soldato d’élite sopravvissuto a una delle battaglie più sanguinose della guerra Russo-Giapponese, lasciato l’esercito ha ormai un solo obiettivo: la corsa all’oro. È questa a portarlo in Hokkaido, l’estremo nord del Giappone abitato dal misterioso popolo degli Ainu e dove secondo una leggenda qualcuno ha nascosto una enorme quantità del prezioso metallo giallo… ma Sugimoto non è l’unico a seguire le tracce che portano al tesoro nascosto e per trovarlo dovrà affrontare spietate bande di criminali, l’esercito e il clima proibitivo dell’Hokkaido con l’aiuto di una giovane e decisa Ainu in cerca di vendetta.

---
In Hokkaido, la regione più a nord del Giappone, Sugimoto è sopravvissuto alla guerra russo-giapponese dell'epoca Meiji. Soprannominato durante la guerra "l'invincibile Sugimoto", adesso inizia la sua corsa all'oro alla ricerca delle ricchezze che gli permetteranno di salvare la moglie di un suo commilitone morto durante la guerra. Durante la ricerca s'imbatte in alcuni indizi che lasciano presagire l'esistenza una riserva d'oro gestita da criminali corrotti. Accompagnato da una ragazza Ainu che ha salvato la sua vita messa alla prova dal terribile clima del nord, i due iniziano la loro avventura contro i criminali.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.ja:
『不死身の杉元』日露戦争での鬼神の如き武功から、そう謳われた兵士は、ある目的の為に大金を欲し、かつてゴールドラッシュに沸いた北海道へ足を踏み入れる。そこにはアイヌが隠した莫大な埋蔵金への手掛かりが!?　立ち塞がる圧倒的な大自然と凶悪な死刑囚。そして、アイヌの少女、エゾ狼との出逢い。『黄金を巡る生存競争』開幕ッ!!!!

description.pt:
Após feitos dignos de um guerreiro na Guerra Russo-Japonesa, o soldado conhecido como “Sugimoto, o imortal” vai para Hokkaido, onde houve a corrida do ouro, em busca de uma grande quantia de dinheiro para realizar certo objetivo. Ali, encontra pistas que levam a um grande tesouro escondido pelos ainus, mas ele precisa enfrentar também a natureza selvagem opressiva e prisioneiros violentos, assim como conhece uma garota ainu e um raro lobo-de-hokkaido. Tem início a luta pela sobrevivência em busca do ouro!!!

---

description.ru:
На Хоккайдо, далеко, в северных землях Японии, живёт Сугимото, переживший русско-японскую войну, и прозванный на ней Бессмертный Сугимото. Теперь он ищет богатства, обещанные золотой лихорадкой, в надежде спасти овдовевшую жену своего покойного товарища. Во время своей охоты на золото, он находит намеки на скрытый золотой склад преступников. Вместе с девушкой айну, которая некогда спасла его, они отважились на смертельное приключение против преступников, в поисках золотого тайника.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

description.tr:
Sugimoto, Meiji Dönemi'nde, Japonya'nın kuzeyindeki Hokkaido'da meydana gelen Rus-Japon Savaşından sağ olarak kurtulur. Savaş boyunca "Ölümsüz Sugimoto" olarak anılan bu adam, şimdilerde savaşta ölen arkadaşının karısını kurtarma ümidi ile altınla gelen vaat edilmiş zenginliğin peşine düşer. Bu altın avcılığı süresince, yozlaşmış suçluların sakladığı altın gömüsüyle alakalı ipuçları bulur. Kötü iklim şartlarında hayatını kurtaran Auni'li bir kızla ortak olarak, altını arayan amansız suçlulara karşı ölüm-kalım mücadelesine girerler.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

description.uk:
Далеко, на північних землях Хоккайдо, ветеран російсько-японської війни, за прізвиськом Суґімото "Безмертний", вирушив на пошуки багатств, обіцяні золотою лихоманкою. Загиблий товариш благав попіклуватись Сайчі про його хвору дружину, що терміново потребує гроші на лікування. Під час свого чергового невдалого полювання на золото, старий п'яниця розбовтує колишньому солдату про таємничий скарб айну, який викрав та сховав невідомий злодій. Натрапивши на слід "Безсмертний" Суґімото Сайчі розпочинає смертельну гонку з дівчинкою айну, на ім’я Асірпа.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.vi:
Tại Hokkaido, hòn đảo xa miền cực bắc của nhật bản, nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Sugimoto Saichi trở về từ cuộc chiến tranh Nga Nhật thời kì Minh Trị. Với biệt danh "Sugimoto Bất Tử" trong chiến tranh, anh lao vào chạy theo cơn sốt vàng nhằm thực hiện ý nguyện của người bạn thân đã mất trong trận chiến

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.pt-br: Em Hokkaido, nas terras do extremo norte do Japão, Sugimoto sobreviveu à guerra russo-japonesa da era Meiji. Apelidado de "Sugimoto, o Imortal" durante a guerra, ele agora procura as riquezas prometidas pela corrida do ouro, na esperança de salvar a esposa viúva de seu falecido companheiro da guerra. Durante a sua caça ao ouro, ele descobre sobre um estoque enorme de ouro escondido por um criminoso. Através de uma parceria com uma garota da tribo Ainu, que salva a sua vida, ele luta contra os criminosos, os militares, e a própria natureza para encontrar o tesouro!
description.zh-hk:
被稱為『不死身的杉元』、在日俄戰爭中有如鬼神般的殺敵， 被世人如此熟知的杉元佐一， 為了得到大量的黃金，來到了昔日淘金熱潮盛行的北海道。 於某次機遇下，他得知了隱藏著愛奴人龐大財寶的線索!? 在充滿威嚴的大自然中， 和許多兇惡的死刑犯、以及愛奴少女相遇， 『尋找黃金的生存競爭』正式開幕!!!

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーSPIRITS

description.en: After Japanese-American FBI agent Taki Kazuya and Kamen Rider 1 defeat a bat monster, they decide to contact the former riders including Stronger to investigate the appearance of monsters attacking them and civilians. Their investigation reveals the coming of an alien empire out to destroy the Earth, finishing the work that Shocker and other terrorist organizations have failed due to their defeat at the Rider's hands.

altTitles.ja: 純喫茶カメリアのみどりさん

description.en: Here is a quaint, old-fashioned café where the scent of freshly brewed tea always lingers. The owner, Midori Hanatsubaki, is a somewhat eccentric lady with a fondness for black tea. Together with her newly hired part-time employee, Daisuke Kise, they open the café for another lively day.
description.ja:
そこは、いつでも淹れたての紅茶が香る昔ながらの喫茶店。
店主の花椿みどりさんは、少し不思議な紅茶好きのお姉さん。
最近入ったアルバイトの黄瀬大助くんと一緒に、今日も元気に開店です――。

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - Valentine's Day 2024

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.en:
Choi Yoonseol, a third-year business student who lives only with her grandfather, suddenly hears the news that her grandfather is seriously ill.

Yoonseol wants to fulfill her grandfather's last request. Her grandfather's last request turns out to be... to see Yoonseol get married? Where can Yoonseol find someone who will marry her when she herself has no experience with love?!

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.fr: Je veux en finir avec le jeu de l'amour

altTitles.nl: Ik wil een einde aan het liefdesspel

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

title.en: Orcsen Oukoku Shi ~Yaban na Orc no Kuni wa, Ikanishite Heiwa na Elf no Kuni o Yakiharau ni Itatta ka~

altTitles.ja: オルクセン王国史 ～野蛮なオークの国は、如何にして平和なエルフの国を焼き払うに至ったか～

altTitles.ja-ro: Orcsen Oukokushi: Yaban na Orc no Kuni wa, Ikanishite Heiwa na Elf no Kuni o Yakiharau ni Itatta ka
Orcsen Oukoku Shi ~Yaban na Orc no Kuni ha, Ikanishite Heiwa na Elf no Kuni wo Yakiharau ni Itatta ka~
Orukusen Oukoku Shi ~Yaban na Ōku no Kuni ha, Ikanishite Heiwa na Erufu no Kuni wo Yakiharau ni Itatta ka~

altTitles.en: History of the Kingdom of the Orcsen: How the Barbarian Orcish Nation Came to Burn Down the Peaceful Elfland

description.en: Gone are the days of swordsmanship and chivalry. Now is the age of gunpowder and war. Our story has two players. The first is Orcsen, a unified nation with many demonic races, led by the oft-reviled orcs. And the second is Elfind, the kingdom ruled by the beautiful yet vainglorious elves. Dineru, chieftain of the dark elves, has been forced to flee her homeland from enemies she had once trusted as friends. In the midst of their forced diaspora, she has a fated encounter with the leader of Orcsen, the orc king Gustav...
description.ja:
「銃と魔法」の時代。

「平和な」美しいエルフの国で白エルフからの虐殺にあったダークエルフ族氏族長、ディネルース。逃亡の果てに斃（たお）れそうになった彼女を助けたのは…。「野蛮な」オーク族を筆頭に多数の魔種族を擁する連合国家オルクセンの王・グスタフ。復讐を果たした暁には「私は貴方に我が命を捧げよう」ーーディネルースの苛烈な決意にグスタフは…。ーーふたりの運命の出逢いが大きく歴史を動かしていく！

altTitles.ja: ２９歳独身中堅冒険者の日常

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Single 29-Year-Old Adventurer

description.en: This story is about Shinonome Hajime, an adventurer of Silver Range. He's dedicated to fulfilling missions from the guild. One day when completing a quest for monster meat, he finds a strange girl named Lily in a dungeon who's far more trouble than she's worth. Saving the girl from certain death, her story reminds him of his similar past and he takes her under his care.

スパイダーマン フェイクレッド

description.en: High school outcast and Spider-Man fan Yuu leads a life of unfulfilled expectations. But after finding the legendary webslinger's suit in an alley, his life makes a big change! What could be lying in store for this aspiring young lad!

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

altTitles.vi: Centuria

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

description.en:
Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!!   
From jobless to the strongest job!!!  



---

description.fr:
Shirosaki Reito a été soudainement aspiré par une mystérieuse fissure et a été transféré entre deux dimensions.  
Il s'est réincarné en bébé dans un autre monde.  
Né dans la famille royale et étant l'héritier du trône, il est cependant chassé du palais.  
La raison ?  
être né en tant que magicien de soutien et avoir une profession d'alchimiste !  
Considérée comme la profession la plus faible, Reito fera tout pour s'endurcir et devenir fort !
description.ru: Широсаки Рейто неожиданно засосало в загадочную расщелину и переместило в измерение между мирами, после чего он переродился младенцем в ином мире. Он появился на свет в королевской семье, оказавшись наследником трона, но всё равно в итоге его выгнали из дворца. Причиной этому послужило то, что он оказался магом поддержки и заполучил профессию алхимика, оказавшуюся слабейшей в этом новом мире. Таких как он в этом фантастическом мире магии считают не имеющими профессии, но, как оказалось, существует некий секрет!! Проследим же путь становления сильнейшим в мире героя со слабейшей профессией!

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

altTitles.vi: Rồng Ruri

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: ハイスコアガール

altTitles.vi: Này, chưa thấy con gái giỏi game bao giờ hả?

description.en: The year is 1991 and 6th grader Yaguchi Haruo only has video games to live for. He's not popular in school and he's neither handsome, funny, nice nor even friendly. The only thing he has going for him is that he is good at video games. One day at the local arcade, he plays Oono Akira, a fellow classmate but who's popular, smart, pretty and a rich girl that absolutely destroys him at Street Fighter II. Not only does he lose to her 30 times in a row, he can't beat her at any game. Haruo can't seem to shake Akira off as she follows him from arcade to arcade everyday after school and beats him every time. As weird as it sounds, the odd duo begins a strange bond and friendship.
description.vi:
Haruo "tay quỷ" không ngờ có ngày cậu lại thua thảm bại 0 -28 trên chính con game yêu quý của mình!!!!! Càng cay cú hơn khi người knock out cậu chính là nhỏ cùng lớp Oono "danh gia vọng tộc", thầy cô yêu mến, bạn bè ngưỡng mộ!!! Còn Haruo, cậu chỉ là thằng nhóc ngáo ngơ học hành bết bát!  
Năm 1991, một nước Nhật đầy hỗn loạn, cuộc đụng độ duyên nợ và ti tỉ vấn đề "vò đầu bứt óc".
description.pt-br: O ano é 1991 e o aluno do sexto ano Yaguchi Haruo só tem vídeo game em mente em sua vida. Ele não é popular na escola e ele não é nem bonito, engraçado, bom, nem mesmo amigável. A única coisa que ele tem de bom para ele é que ele é bom em vídeo game. Um dia no arcade local, ele joga contra Oono Akira, uma colega de classe, mas que é popular, inteligente, bonita e uma menina rica que absolutamente o destrói em Street Fighter II. Não perdendo somente uma vez, mas 30 vezes seguidas, ele não pode vencê-la em qualquer jogo. Haruo não pode parecer abalado enquanto Akira o segue de arcade em arcade, todos os dias depois da escola e bate nele o tempo todo. Por mais estranho que pareça, o estranho casal começa uma estranha ligação e amizade.

altTitles.ja: アスペル・カノジョ

altTitles.zh: 同一屋檐下，阿斯伯格的她

description.en:
Yokoi is a manga artist who spends his nights delivering newspapers just to make rent, since his original works just don’t seem to sell.

Suddenly, one day he gets a visit from Saito-san, a self-proclaimed fan of Yokoi’s work who made the long journey to meet him. Yokoi quickly realizes that the things Saito-san sees, feels, and thinks about are different from most people…

These two struggle together to find a place to belong in this unique slice-of-life!

---
Note: The English translation uses the volume chapter numbering while the Chinese translation uses the website chapter numbering starting from Chapter 27.

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.ja: 異種族レビュアーズ

description.en:
In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste. 

Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, and show us that the fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.
description.ru: Действие манги происходит в вымышленном мире, населённом различными расами разумных существ, в котором существует процветающий рынок интимных услуг. Благодаря такому высокому развитию секс-индустрии в мире появились профессиональные критики, специализирующиеся исключительно на оценке качества проституток. Одними из них являются человек Станк и эльф Зел, путешествующие из города в город для оценки каждого местного квартала красных фонарей, после чего посылают свои обзоры для составления сводного рейтинга борделей. Объединившись с ангелом по имени Крим, критики собирают информацию о сексуальных достоинствах всех видов живых существ этого мира, получая удовольствие от процесса и зарабатывая попутно дополнительные деньги.
description.es-la: En nuestro mundo, la raza humana debate constantemente sobre varios temas importantes, como por ejemplo: ¿Cual chica es la mejor? ¿Y qué tan buena es como material de masturbación? ¿Qué fetiche es el más sexy? Acompaña a estos grandes guerreros, que se presentan con diferentes chicas, diferentes opiniones, diferentes erecciones, y que nos muestran que un mundo de fantasía puede no ser tan diferente al nuestro.
description.pt-br: Em nosso mundo, a raça humana debate constantemente várias questões importantes, como: qual é a melhor garota? Quão bom é um material para se masturbar? Qual fetiche é o mais sexy?... Acompanhe esses grandes guerreiros enquanto eles nos apresentam garotas diferentes, opiniões diferentes, tesões diferentes e nos mostram que o mundo da fantasia pode não ser tão diferente do nosso.

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

title.en: It’s Too Hard to Chase the Tsundere Prince

altTitles.zh-ro: Ao Jiao Wangye Tai Nan Zhui

description.en:
This is a story about a murdered lady, who then time travels and is reborn as the second daughter in a wealthy household. She was often bullied in her own household. After time travelling, she acts all frail and weak in the situations she encounter, while intelligently overcoming crisis after crisis. Even without a royal background, she is slowly but surely climbing to the top!  
  
Novel Author : ZhaoZhao
description.fr: Une femme médecin assassinée, voyage dans le temps et renaît dans le corps de la deuxième fille d'un famille riche, souvent harcelée dans sa propre maison. Après ce voyage dans le temps, elle fait semblant d'être faible dans les situations qu'elle rencontre, tout affrontant intelligemment crises après crises.||

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

Yua became my sister through our parents' remarriage. She's incredibly cute and adores me...

But sometimes, the expressions she shows...
description.vi:
Yua là em gái kế của tôi khi bố mẹ chúng tôi tái hôn với nhau.

Em ấy rất là dễ thương và quý tôi lắm luôn. Nhưng có gì đó cứ là lạ.

description.en: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.ja: サイコバスターズ

description.en: Out of the blue, a beautiful girl asks Kakeru to run away with her. This could be any boy’s dream come true, but there’s something strange afoot. It turns out that the girl is on the run from a shadowy government organization intent on using her psychic abilities for its own nefarious ends. But why does she need Kakeru’s help? Could it be that he has secret powers, too?

description.en:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)
description.pl: Czy nieuleczalny otaku może być idealnym facetem? Dowód na to, że wbrew pozorom manga opierająca się na haremie może być oryginalna.
description.ru:
Кацураги Кейма – мастер обольщения, который знает сотни приемов, как влюбить в себя девушку, с легкостью предугадывает каждый её шаг и называет себя Богом-Обольстителем.   
А ведь именно такого ищут… в аду, откуда сбежало множество душ, что закрадываются в сердца невинных девушек и преспокойно там живут. И по мнению здешнего руководства, Кацураги и есть тот единственный, кто может покорить сердце жертвы, освободив от сбежавшей души, а посему заключают с ним договор.   
Но они просчитались в одном - Кацураги обожает виртуальных девушек, а живых, настоящих, считает мусором, не достойных его божественного внимания. Однако ему придется что-то срочно придумать, иначе он лишится головы.
description.pt-br: Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato. Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato.

altTitles.ja: 闇麻のマミヤ

description.en: It has been 20 years since the legendary mahjong player, Akagi, left this world. In this new era known as "Reiwa," a mahjong player who solves disputes with mahjong gambles has appeared, only known as "Yami-Mahjong Fighter Mamiya!"

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

description.fr: Chu Lin est un jeune homme terriblement séduisant qui a énormément de succès auprès de la gent féminine, mais ses relations ne durent jamais bien longtemps. Après s'être de nouveau fait larguer, il traîne dans un bar où il rencontre Ziming, qui l'a sauvé d'une femme aux mauvaises intentions. Ce dernier lui propose alors une aventure d'un soir, mais Chu Lin lui oppose un refus catégorique ! Cependant, au moment où il se rappelle qu'il est dépourvu de gîte et de couvert, Chu Lin décide de revoir l'offre.

title.en: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: 男子だと思っていた幼馴染との新婚生活がうまくいきすぎる件について

altTitles.en: Regarding my Married Life with a Childhood Friend Whom I Thought Was a Boy Going Way Too Smoothly

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống hôn nhân của tôi và "Thằng Bạn"

description.en: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
description.ja:
親友だから、通じ合えちゃう。

高校生の秀一は、男だと思っていた幼馴染の唯華といきなり結婚することになってしまう。10年ぶりの再会に、最初はぎこちなかったが徐々に昔を思い出して――。楽しい高校生活と新婚生活を満喫しちゃう!?

意識しあっても、あと一歩が踏み出せない。
description.pt-br: Shuichi, um estudante do ensino médio, acabou se casando com seu amigo de infância que ele pensava ser um menino. Em seu reencontro após 10 anos, sua amiga de infância Yuika se transformou em uma linda garota, o que inicialmente deixou Shuichi bastante nervoso. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, ele gradualmente se acostumou com a sensação de proximidade como melhores amigos - e assim começa a história de amor deles como um casal ideal com um toque encantador de inocência!

description.en:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

description.en: The protagonist Reiji Hashimoto who's sharp-minded and cold-hearted is super critical of sly and calculating women, and he hates his classmate Mikage Yakushiji who is a typical sly girl. But in reality, Mikage is just a clumsy and natural airhead who loves him!!
description.ja: あざとい女に超厳しい、頭脳明晰・冷酷無残な主人公 橋本令児は、クラスメイトの典型的あざと女子・薬師寺みかげを嫌いに嫌っていた。だけどみかげは令児のことが大好きなだけの天然ポンコツ女子だった‼ 嚙み合わないふたりの静かなる闘いを描く、新感覚すれ違いラブコメ！

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!
